let's try to keep it good between each other.
Toddo I never received your YK wish. I would have responded, you know that.
I don't have time to rumble anymore on Twitter this week. See you all back on Monday. Will be at @realmoney and @SeabreezeLP seabreezepartnerslp.com/sign…
When the facts change, I change. Do you sir?

This morning on @realmoney I discuss "Lessons Learned" (from my foray into cannabis), 5 Bank Stock Headwinds (and why I had materially reduced financial exposure) and deliver more reasons why I expect little upside to equities. My views, always in doubt. Enjoy the day @dougkass

Yesterday I was blocked on Twitter by an advisor to $VRNOF and $MSOS (and other cannabis equities) ostensibly because I sold out of those positions (and wrote why in a column on @realmoney). Blocking someone on Twitter is the best way to show your own insecurity...
This was the second or third time he has blocked me because of my negative cannabis comments. More on @realmoney in "Lessons Learned" this morning. @threadreaderapp unroll

A positive for tech (see @bloomberg headline) and no one discussing, Thoma Bravo just raised $32.4 billion for three tech focused funds! (Move over Cathie Woods) @tomkeene @jimcramer @lisaabramowicz1 @ferrotv @andrewrsorkin @carlquintanilla @ScottWapnerCNBC @riskreversal
Disappointingly, Congress drops cannabis reform from the Defense Bill thedeepdive.ca/congress-drop…

On @realmoney Caveat Emptor: Don't Believe The Hype * What I have learned from my unprofitable journey into investing in cannabis stocks... and how you can benefit from my mistake realmoney.thestreet.com/doug…
* Be Independent In View * Be Realistic * Fundamentals Trump Everything * Evaluate The Orbit of Your Outside Resources * Analysts Are Notoriously Bullish - Take Their Views With A Grain of Salt"

* Seek Out Competitors' Input * Talk to Managements But Don't Take Their Bullish Views as Gospel * (Almost Always) Seek Out Superior Managements With Solid Accountants/Auditors and Financial Controls * Be Cynical With Regard to The Timing and Anticipation of Regulatory Change

* The Three Worse Words in Investing Are... "Total Addressable Market (TAM)" * When Looking for a "Bottom," Selling Call Premium Against Unloved Stocks Can Insulate Investors From Some Losses * A Low/Conservative Weighting (Particularly Of Out of Favor Sectors That Are Trending

Lower in Price) Can Also Insulate Investors From Losses My unprofitable sojourn into cannabis stocks are a good example of employing some discipline in a bad investment. But today's opening missive has broader implications beyond weed. Learn from my mistakes, I try to.
